text: Klimovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Zirgansky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 20 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 25 km from Meleuz, 6 km from Zirgan. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Klimovka, Republic of Bashkortostan
